title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: TAPPA Process for Remote Micro-Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and understanding of fundamental social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design social studies micro-lessons by applying the 5 stages of the TAPPA process (Target, Accomplishment, Past, Prototype, Artifact).
Learners can develop a 5-minute micro-lesson plan in a simulation/VR environment and create assessment tools to measure learning effectiveness.
Learners can produce educational materials under technical constraints by applying principles of smartphone-optimized content creation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
